title: Beautiful Weather Watch Face
summary: The best watch face, your gallery as wallpaper and weather information

descriptionHTML:
The most customizable Watch Face with wallpapers from your own gallery, weather, battery level...

Fully compatible with Android Wear.
Devices: Moto360 Motorola, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, ZenWatch ASUS, Sony SmartWatch 3 Samsung Gear LIVE (not for Gear, Gear Gear 2 or S).

Watch Faces native support for Google.

Get information at a glance as the current date, or the battery level clock without touching anything, no need for external applications.

Since the phone application, you can customize many aspects of the Watch Face (Some options are only for PRO users):
- Refresh interval for weather information.
- Select the color of the text.
- Show / hide shading.
- Set the temperature format.
- Choose from 8 different wallpapers.
- Select a wallpapers from your gallery.
- Select the texts sizes.
- Select which information see on sleep mode.
- Choose from 5 different fonts.
- Show / hide battery icon.
- Select the time format (3 options).
- Choose the date format (7 options);
- Select the combination of positions that you like, there are 4 options to choose.
- Dynamic wallpapers as weather information.
- Option to choose the size of the (Notifications) cards.
- Option to adjust the size to free area when a notification is displayed.
- Option to show / hide temperature max / min.
- Display also the phone battery.
- Low battery consumption.
- Option to display the current weather and forecast.
- Placement of the status bar.
- Placing Ok Google.
- Option shading on the status bar and Ok Google.

After installation you will have the new area available on the clock and an application on your phone.

To change the clock hold the current field and select the sphere Beautiful Weather Watch Face, Android Wear or open the application and select the area directly from there, to customize the field open the phone application or from the application settings Android Wear.

If you have an idea for improving the application, or you think something is missing that is essential for you, please contact me by emailing guzquiano.developer@gmail.com

Superandroide: http://www.superandroide.com/2014/10/beautiful-weather-watchface-dale-un.html
comments: Used to work but stopped. This was a great app for a while but it no longer tells the correct temperature. WeatherBug on my Droid Turbo says it's 95 in NYC but on my Moto 360, it says it's 79. Slightly off! :( It is also displaying the moon even though it is 4:30 in the afternoon.

For a watch app that's made for weather, its not working.  I spent $$ for the pro but should have reviewed these comments before.  The weather is stuck at 100 degrees.  Had almost everything I wanted.....but stuck watching incorrect weather.

DON'T WORK "error" failure to connect with google play. Device: Samsung Gear S.  Im looking for digital watch that has battery meter and temperature. Thought this was perfect. Fix bugs or offer suggestions and I'll be HAPPY!!

75% functional Paid for full version. Forecasts stopped updating after a week or two. Tried all the recommended fixes: uninstalling/reinstalling, resetting my phone, etc. Bummer it doesn't work for me (Samsung Gear Live). There aren't enough Android Wear forecast options out there (that work).

Temp is WAY off This could be a nice watch face except the weather is way wrong. It says it's 100 degrees with a high of 999 degrees. It's 60 outside. I'm using the Yahoo weather to pull it from. Too bad. Looks like app hasn't been updated in almost a year. Google needs to pull this from the store.

Works great on my LG G Watch. But I paid for Premium version and the free background look better I'm starting to think I got ripped off. Would be 5 stars if premium had better wallpapers and could keep the screen on longer
